page.title: 05LONGTON CHURCH CLUBS
page.content: {Longton Church of Saint Andrew} is at the centre of the village and is the centre of many activities. There is a{playgroup}for children from 2 to 5 years old, then{Sunday School, {Beaver Scouts Brownies}and {Cub {Scouts}for the under 11's.{Sunday Club and{Crossfire}together with{Scouts}and {Guides}cater for the young teenagers, {Venture Scouts}is for the under 21's. There is a thriving{dancing {school,}for ballet and tap, based at the Church Hall as is the{Flower Club, {Drama Club and Church Choir.}People of all ages attend these meetings (there are about 15 adults at the {dancing {school}). The ladies have the choice of afternoon or evening{Mother's Union meetings. There are{Young Wives}and{ {Men's Guild}organisations which have local guest speakers to entertain their members.
